column1: Little Goat Diner////Absolutely love this place. Never had a less-than-stellar experience no matter the time of day
column3: or how crowded they might be. Staff is always helpful and personable
column5: hilarious. Flavors are perfectly balanced and make sense after they hit the palate
column6: though they may sound slightly insane on the menu. I'm as gluten-free as I can be
column7: and the staff is typically very open to helping me figure out ways to modify dishes as needed. Nary a blink of the eye with questions about what might be in a dish or with requests for no bun on a bahn mi burger. Totally worth the wait for Sunday brunch
